Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Ornithologist \Or`ni*thol"o*gist\, n. [Cf. F. ornithologiste.] One skilled in ornithology; a student of ornithology; one who describes birds. [1913 Webster]
ornithologist n : a zoologist who studies birds [syn: {bird watcher}]
